thread.title: Pedro and Remy out for Chelsea - World - Sports
thread.title_full: Pedro and Remy out for Chelsea - World - Sports - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Pedro and Remy out for Chelsea - World - Sports
text:
Chelsea will be without forwards Pedro and Loic Remy for Tuesday's Champions League visit to Dynamo Kiev.
Manager Jose Mourinho told a news conference on Monday that both players had minor injuries and would not be risked against the Group G joint leaders.
Premier League champions Chelsea have made a poor start to the season but were boosted by Saturday's 2-0 home win over Aston Villa.
The Londoners, who won the Champions League in 2012, have three points from two games in Group G, one fewer than Kiev and Porto.
